element.name: ui
element.description: Root element (related to Custom UI window).

attribute.name: title
attribute.description: Title of the Custom UI window.

attribute.name: resizable
attribute.description: Make window resizable if true.

attribute.name: closeable
attribute.description: Make window closeable if true.

attribute.name: layout
attribute.description: Layout of the window widget.

attribute.name: onclose
attribute.description: Name of a Lua function to handle the close event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle). When a callback is specified, the window will not close upon pressing the close button. It may be hidden or destroyed explicitly in the callback.

attribute.name: text
attribute.description: Text on the button.

attribute.name: default
attribute.description: If true, this is the default button of the dialog window.

attribute.name: onclick
attribute.description: Name of a Lua function to handle the click event. Arguments of the function are: (id).

attribute.name: text
attribute.description: Text on the checkbox label.

attribute.name: checked
attribute.description: If true, the checkbox is initially checked.

attribute.name: onchange
attribute.description: Name of a Lua function to handle the change event. Arguments of the function are: (id, newValue).

element.name: combobox
element.description: A combobox widget. It allows to select one from many items from a dropdown menu. Items can be added as child XML nodes, e.g. <item>Item text</item>, or dynamically via the Lua API.

attribute.name: onchange
attribute.description: Name of a Lua function to handle the change event. Arguments of the function are: (id, newValue).

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Initial text.

attribute.name: onchange
attribute.description: Name of a Lua function to handle the change event. Arguments of the function are: (id).

element.name: group
element.description: A widget for grouping other widgets. Other widgets are specified as children of the <group> node. It has its own layout, so it can be used to use a different layout only for a group of widgets. It is also required to group a set of radiobutton widgets.

attribute.name: flat
attribute.description: If true, the group will have no visual appearance (text will be ignored). Otherwise, it will have some visual appearance, depending on the platform.

attribute.name: layout
attribute.description: Layout of the widget.

attribute.name: minimum
attribute.description: Minimum value.

attribute.name: maximum
attribute.description: Maximum value.

attribute.name: tick-interval
attribute.description: Tick interval.

attribute.name: tick-position
attribute.description: In which direction to draw ticks.

attribute.name: inverted
attribute.description: If true, minimum and maximum will be swapped.

attribute.name: onchange
attribute.description: Name of a Lua function to handle the change event. Arguments of the function are: (id, newValue).

attribute.name: file
attribute.description: Display the image from the specified file.

attribute.name: width
attribute.description: Desired width for the initial image.

attribute.name: height
attribute.description: Desired height for the initial image.

attribute.name: text
attribute.description: Text on the label.

attribute.name: wordwrap
attribute.description: If true, long text will wrap in multiple lines, otherwise will be cut.

attribute.name: text
attribute.description: Text on the button.

attribute.name: checked
attribute.description: If true, this button will be initially checked.

attribute.name: onclick
attribute.description: Name of a Lua function to handle the click event. Arguments of the function are: (id).

element.name: spinbox
element.description: A widget for numeric input, with increase/decrease buttons.

attribute.name: minimum
attribute.description: Minimum value.

attribute.name: maximum
attribute.description: Maximum value.

attribute.name: prefix
attribute.description: String prefix in the displayed value.

attribute.name: suffix
attribute.description: String suffix in the displayed value.

attribute.name: step
attribute.description: Step (increment/decrement) when using the buttons.

attribute.name: onchange
attribute.description: Name of a Lua function to handle the change event. Arguments of the function are: (id, newValue).

element.name: tabs
element.description: A tabs widget. Must contain only <tab> child elements.

element.name: tab
element.description: A tab for the tabs widget. Can only be contained in a <tabs> element. Can contain widgets, just like <ui> and <group>, and has its own layout.

attribute.name: title
attribute.description: Title of the tab.

attribute.name: layout
attribute.description: Layout of the widget.

attribute.name: minimum
attribute.description: Minimum value.

attribute.name: maximum
attribute.description: Maximum value.

attribute.name: tick-interval
attribute.description: Tick interval.

attribute.name: tick-position
attribute.description: In which direction to draw ticks.

attribute.name: inverted
attribute.description: If true, minimum and maximum will be swapped.

attribute.name: onchange
attribute.description: Name of a Lua function to handle the change event. Arguments of the function are: (id, newValue).

element.name: stretch
element.description: Special element that can be put inside a parent with layout (such as <ui>, <group> or <tab>) if the layout is hbox or vbox.

attribute.name: factor
attribute.description: Stretch factor (see http://doc.qt.io/qt-4.8/layout.html#stretch-factors).

element.name: br
element.description: Special element that can be put inside a parent with layout (such as <ui>, <group> or <tab>) if the layout is grid, and it is used to begin a new line in the grid layout.
